name: Peter Desnoyers
content: Peter Desnoyers Peter Desnoyers Associate Professor, Khoury College of Computer Sciences p.desnoyers@northeastern.edu I am an associate professor in the Khoury College of Computer Sciences at Northeastern University, and a founding investigator of the Mass Open Cloud. My research is primarily in the areas of data storage systems and cloud computing, and especially the intersection of the two. My current work focuses on research to enable open clouds – hybrid clouds combining multiple tenants and providers. Interests cloud computing object storage and caching flash and SMR translation layers Academia UMass Amherst 2003 - 2008 Ph.D. MIT 1982 - 1988 SB., SM.
